name: Second Chance Sleigh Ride
description:
Santa has forgotten one last town to hit before Christmas. He quickly heads over to give the kids their presents. 

Click the start button to start the game. To play the game use "d" to fire shoot a Christmas present into the houses with a green "N" above them for Nice.  Use "f" to fire a lump of coal into the red "N" naughty houses. You also have five shots that you can fire, with "e", to Naughty houses and give some kids a second chance. These shots can help you or hurt you, but the rewards are great. 

Good Luck and Happy Holidays!
